Sql.CDATA: -- OpenTR Data IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_OpenTRDetail' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_OpenTRDetail] GO CREATE VIEW v_OpenTRDetail AS SELECT t.Company, t.Sku, t.Warehouse, t.ETA AS StartETA , isnull(min(t2.ETA), '9999/12/31') AS EndETA, t.OpenQty FROM v_OpenTRSourceData t LEFT JOIN v_OpenTRSourceData t2 ON t.ETA < t2.ETA AND t.Company = t2.Company AND t.Sku = t2.Sku AND t.Warehouse = t2.Warehouse GROUP BY t.Company,t.Sku,t.Warehouse,t.ETA,t.OpenQty
